thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1795
thread.title: Jess

author: Jess
title: Jess
text: Took two hours to get my flight changed then get a call and email 12 hours later saying it was more than they had told me and more than I was already charged for. Absolutely ridiculous! Can't get a refund. Went directly to the West jet website and I can get the exact same flights for $300 cheaper! Money scam! Apparently there was nothing they can do. Complete waste of money and time!If you're looking for real reviews go to #flighthub on Facebook. I wish I had!
